common.name: Name
common.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset to the default values?

errors.undefinedPath: No path to the Arma 3 folder was specified. Go to Settings page to define it.
errors.notAllowed: You do not have the required permissions to modify this category.
errors.undefinedArmaPath: The path to the Arma 3 folder is not defined
errors.undefinedSteamPath: The path to the SteamCMD folder is not defined
errors.incorrectSteamPath: Path specified for SteamCMD does not contain 'steamcmd.exe'
errors.steamAccountRequired: A Steam account is required to perform this action

rules.privilegeRequired: A level of privilege is required

password.lowercaseRequired: Must contain at least 1 lowercase character
password.uppercaseRequired: Must contain at least 1 uppercase character
password.numericRequired: Must contain at least 1 numeric character
password.specialRequired: Must contain at least 1 special character

download.steamGuardCodeError: Connection failed with Steam Guard code
download.diskSpaceError: Failed: not enough space or the specified account does not have Arma 3

upload.updateLocalModInfo: If you want to update a local mod, delete it first.
upload.updateMission: To update a mission, you just have to redownload it on the server.
upload.modNaming: The mod folder must be correctly named (with an '@' in front of the name and without spaces)
upload.modZip: The mod folder must be put in a .zip
upload.missionNaming: The mission must be correctly named (without spaces and a valid map name)
upload.missionExtension: The mission must be a .pbo file

difficulty.information: To use a custom difficulty, indicate 'Custom' in the server configuration file.

params.autoInitHint: -autoInit: Automatically initialize mission just like first client does. Server config file must contain 'Persistent=1', if it's 0 autoInit skips
params.loadMissionToMemoryHint: -loadMissionToMemory: Server will load mission into memory on first client downloading it
params.hugePagesHint: -hugepages: Enables hugepages with the default memory allocator for both client/server
params.enableHTHint: -enableHT : Enables the use of all logical CPU cores. If your CPU does not support Hyper-Threading or similar technology, this parameter is ignored
params.filePatchingHint: -filePatching : Allow the game to load unpacked data

index.noLogs: The logs are only displayed if the server is started

profiles.howToCreate: You can create a profile by entering a name in the field and clicking on the icon
profiles.noNameError: Please specify a name for the profile
profiles.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this profile?

logs.filterInfo: The logs are classified by profiles. Click on a profile to view its logs.
logs.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this log file?
logs.confirmAllDelete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all log files?

mission.title: Missions
mission.afterDeleteMessage: Make sure that the mission which has just been deleted is not activated in any profile, otherwise the server will not start.
mission.workshopDownloadError: Unable to download this mission from the workshop

mods.title: Mods
mods.noLocalMod: No mod found in the Arma 3 folder
mods.importSuccess: Mods that could be detected have been imported
mods.notEntirelyDeleted: The mod was not deleted correctly because some folder does not exist or the application does not have access to it

settings.title: Demeter configuration
settings.steamCMDHint: Absolute path to the folder where SteamCMD is installed
settings.armaPathHint: Absolute path to the folder where Arma 3 is installed
settings.steamAccountMessage: You can specify a steam account that will manage the download of the game and mods.
settings.steamWorkshopInfo: To be able to use the workshop related functionalities the account must have Arma 3
settings.passwordHint: The password is never displayed. To modify it, specify it again
settings.steamGuardHint: If yes, you will be asked for the Steam Guard code before each download

users.adminUserAlert: It is strongly advised not to leave the default account (admin) activated
users.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this user?
users.supAdminError: Impossible to delete: there must always be an active commander account
